sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import apiBasePath from './globalVars'; import axios from 'axios'; function Main() { const personid = 3; const [albumList, setalbumList] = useState(""); useEffect( () => { Axios.get(apiBasePath + '/getalbums/' + personid) .then( res1 => { for (let i = 0; i < res1.data.length; i++) { Axios.get(apiBasePath + '/getaveragescore/' + res1.data[i].albumid) .then( res2 => { res1.data[i].averagescore = res2.data[0].avg } ) } setalbumList(res1.data) } ); }, [albumList] ) const deletealbum = (id) => { var confirm = window.confirm('Delete album?') confirm ? Axios.delete(apiBasePath + '/deletealbum/' + id) : void(0) } return (

Albums of the Year

{ Array.isArray(albumList) ? albumList.map( (album) => { console.log(album.averagescore) return (
{album.artist}
{album.averagescore}
{album.title}
Release Date: {(album.releasedate == null) ? null : album.releasedate.substring(0,10)}
{album.genre}
{album.recordlabel}
Added by: {album.addedby}
Added date: {(album.addeddate == null) ? null : album.addeddate.substring(0,10)}

Average score

{album.averagescore}
) } ) : null }
); } export default Main;
